mapper.insert: insert into article (bookno, title, writedate, score, score_count, text, traveldate, day) values(#{bookno}, #{title}, now(), #{score}, #{score_count}, #{text}, #{traveldate}, #{day})
mapper.select: select articleno, bookno, title, writedate, score, score_count, text, traveldate, day from article where bookno = #{bookno} order by writedate
select articleno, bookno, title, writedate, score, score_count, text, traveldate, day from article where articleno = #{articleno}
mapper.insert: insert into article_score (score, author, articleno) values(#{score}, #{author}, #{articleno})
mapper.update: Update book set score = (select AVG(score) from article where bookno = #{bookno}) where articleno = #{articleno}
